---
title: "Yuxi Personal Dataset Visualization"
format: pdf
editor: Yuxi Luo
---

```{r load_data}
library(tidyverse)

AI_art <- read.csv("PS.csv")

head(AI_art)

```
```{r bar1}
style_counts <- AI_art %>%
  count(Style, name = "Count")
ggplot(style_counts, aes(x = Style, y = Count, fill = Style)) + geom_col() + labs(x = "Style", y = "Count")
```

```{r bar}
ggplot(data = AI_art, mapping = aes(x = Scale, y = Likes, fill = Scale)) + geom_col()
```
